pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fisherian and Neymanian Methods for Detecting and Measuring Treatment Effect Variation // Implements methods developed by Ding, Feller, and Miratrix (2016) doi:10.1111/rssb.12124 arXiv:1412.5000, and Ding, Feller, and Miratrix (2018) doi:10.1080/01621459.2017.1407322 arXiv:1605.06566 for testing whether there is unexplained variation in treatment effects across observations, and for characterizing the extent of the explained and unexplained variation in treatment effects. The package includes wrapper functions implementing the proposed methods, as well as helper functions for analyzing and visualizing the results of the test.
